markdown:
- Fix creative item banners
- Added items from challenge mode
- Display if item is from creative or challenge mode 

_Submitted to App Stores 2022-07-20_

- Display which DressBot box an item comes from
- Package updates
- Navbar upgrade
- Add developer details button

- Added Capsule items
- Fix scrolling on Raid Calculator
- Add edible stats 
- Add Packing recipes
- Fix upgrade item relationships

- Regenerate data from 0.5.0 Game Files
- Fix Raid Calculator not displaying Potatoes
- Updated languages
- Fix Cart (View all RequiredItems) not loading on some devices

- Fix cart delete all
- Fix Drawer menu display bug
- Improve steam news page
  - Fix placeholder steam image
- Fix loading icon on iOS

- Fix cart calculations for recipes that output more than 1 item
- Improved language system
- Improved Patreon page
- Improved network image loading animations

- Cart page tree view
  - View the required items for each level
- Improved Steam News page
  - Improved stability
  - Cleaned up information such as the descriptions
  - Added number of comments
- Add backup data when device is offline or network request fails
  - Patrons, Downloads, WhatIsNew, etc
- Fix language change happening immediately
  - Fixed language not changing on selecting a new language

- Regen data for game version 0.4.8
- Updated Brazilian Portuguese translation by Anderson Valle

- Added new items and data from experimental branch
  - e.g. Radio Beacon
- Added "What is New" page
  - From this page you can see the details for each of the app's update
- Display crafting recipe in "Used in Recipe" section
- Fix Cookbot section

- Add link to Patreon on Patrons page
- Add loot chance display

- Add Contributors page
- Display which clothing container an article of clothing comes from
- Add number of likes and dislikes to Steam News
- Add Patreons page
- Add Bottom navigation bar

- Filtering Cosmetics
- Save raid configuration to device
- Update contributors list
